name: Navigation Light
description: A light used on ships to ensure visibility and safe navigation during low light or nighttime conditions.

name: Brazz Light
description: A light fixture typically used in marine applications, offering illumination in various sections of a vessel.

name: Compass
description: An instrument used for navigation and orientation, showing direction relative to the Earth's magnetic poles.

name: Life Jackets
description: Personal flotation devices designed to keep a person afloat in water during emergencies.

name: Fire Extinguisher
description: A device used to extinguish small fires aboard the vessel.

name: Boat Anchor
description: A heavy object used to moor the vessel to the seabed, preventing it from drifting.

name: Search Light
description: A powerful light used to illuminate areas, typically during search and rescue operations or low-visibility situations.

name: Telegraph
description: An engine order telegraph used for communicating commands to the engine room from the bridge.

name: Ship Steering Wheel
description: A wheel used to steer the vessel, controlling its direction.

name: Wind Indicator
description: A device used to show the direction and speed of the wind.

name: Life Raft
description: A small, inflatable raft used as a means of escape in the event of an emergency.
